name: Combat Gun Shooting
description:
Welcome to your new shooting assignment! a new threat is appeared in city so, now you have a new mission! terrorist groups are invading cities around the world. you are master assassin and a covert special ops soldier and you have been hired to push back this terrorism, at all cost! ready to play your part in dangerous FPS attacks and infiltrate secure locations and eliminate high-profile target to rescue the citizens.

Features:
Realistic 3d island war environment
Ultra-realistic graphics and animations
Loads of thrilling missions
Addicting FPS game-play
Easy and intuitive control of guns
